main event: Observers at Selfridge AFB reported seeing multiple objects in the sky resembling stars, which flashed red, green, and white.
interesting points: The objects appeared in large numbers and were noticed on several occasions,The observers described the objects as very bright and capable of changing colors,The objects exhibited varied courses in the sky,Some observers expressed frustration in not being able to count the objects accurately,The report mentions a communication with a high-ranking military officer regarding the reliability of the initial witness.
sighted object: objects resembling stars that flashed red, green, and white
witness description: Witness was a civilian, middle-aged, and claimed to have seen the objects multiple times.
